Body:
Description: Hello,

Customer name is PrivatBank.
They updated EPP server version to 5.9.4.1.
But after checking the server security update, it returned "No updates available", but the last security updates were installed on 2024-03-30.
Could you please check if there were some security updates for Server Ubuntu 18.04 at this period of time?
Attaching screenshot.

What We've Learned Updated: Privat Bank has issues with the backend security updates where they can't seem to install updates for Ubuntu 18.04 since March 2024.
Seems like this would be caused to the Ubuntu 18.04 EOL and suggested to use a new Ubuntu OS.
Will wait for their response.

Next Steps Updated: Sent note with instructions.
Will wait for their response.

What We've Learned Updated: Client asked if customer can upgrade the server distributive version only by migrating to the new instance.
Alternatively,  they want to know if it can be potentially done just by upgrading the backend version?

What We've Learned Updated: Client asked if customer can upgrade the server distributive version only by migrating to the new instance.
Alternatively,  they want to know if it can be potentially done just by upgrading the backend version
Next Steps Updated: Informed them about the upgradation process that can be done through migration from 18.04 to 22.04.
